i18n.title: String Is ISO Formatted Date
i18n.description: In this lab, we will explore how to determine if a given string is a valid date string in the simplified extended ISO format (ISO 8601). We will use the Date constructor and its associated methods to create a Date object from the string and check its validity. By the end of the lab, you will have a better understanding of how to work with dates in JavaScript and how to validate them using the ISO format.

meta.title: Validating ISO Formatted Dates in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to check if a given string is a valid ISO 8601 date format using JavaScript's Date object.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, iso 8601, javascript tutor, javascript practice online, validation, programming tutorial, javascript lab, date

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 字符串是否为ISO格式日期
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何确定给定字符串是否为简化扩展ISO格式（ISO 8601）的有效日期字符串。我们将使用Date构造函数及其相关方法从字符串创建一个Date对象并检查其有效性。在实验结束时，你将更好地理解如何在JavaScript中处理日期以及如何使用ISO格式验证日期。

meta.title: 在JavaScript中验证ISO格式日期
meta.description: 学习如何使用JavaScript的Date对象检查给定字符串是否为有效的ISO 8601日期格式。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript练习, ISO 8601, JavaScript教程, 在线JavaScript练习, 验证, 编程教程, JavaScript实验, 日期

steps.title: 字符串是否为ISO格式日期
